## Get to know 
<details>
<summary>&#129488;</summary>

I am a Bristol based **Full-Stack Developer** journeying into unknown territories in pursuit of discovery.

My preference is towards the **Back-End** as I enjoy interacting with data and using logic to extract useful information. Conducting a quantative study in my psychology degree inspired me to want to have greater involvement with data analytics and I discovered a natural knack for query language when tasked with asessing client data and formulating responsive Excel spreadsheets for task management.

**OOP**, **Relational Databases**, and **App Architecture** are the things I have enjoyed most to date but **APIs** are quickly growing on me. 
I enjoy **Type-Safe** coding with **PHP** and **TypeScript** but I aim to be **Tech-Agnostic**.
</details>
